greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2^phi(n) - 1 = A066781(n) - 1.
comment: Number of nonempty subsets of reduced residue system [RRS(n)] modulo n.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
N. Bliss, B. Fulan, S. Lovett, and J. Sommars, Strong Divisibility, Cyclotomic Polynomials, and Iterated Polynomials, Amer. Math. Monthly, 120 (2013), 519-536.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{i=1..n} binomial(phi(n), i). - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Mar 10 2012
maple: A100371:=n->2^numtheory[phi](n)-1: seq(A100371(n), n=1..60); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 14 2017
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 30 2004
ext: Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 07 2013
